sentences.sContent: Charles had been described as a gentle and even-tempered man.
sentences.sContent_eng: Charles had been described as a gentle and even-tempered man.
sentences.sCn: 查尔斯被描写成是个温柔、性情平和的人。

trans.tranCn: 性情平和的； 不易生气的
trans.tranOther: someone who is even-tempered is calm and does not easily become angry
